item.title: Service Discovery in Microservices With .NET and Consul
item.description: Service discovery is a pattern that allows developers to use logical names to refer to external services, instead of physical IP addresses and ports. In this week's issue, we'll see how to implement service discovery in your .NET microservices with Consul. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/service-discovery-in-microservices-with-net-and-consul
